set(THIS_PROJECT EditorFbxPlugin)

project( ${THIS_PROJECT} )


#START-FILE-LIST
# File List auto generated by waf2cmake.py, do not modify manually.

set (SourceGroup_Root
	FBXExporter.cpp
	FBXExporter.h
	FBXPlugin.cpp
	FBXPlugin.h
	FBXPlugin.rc
	FBXSettingsDlg.cpp
	FBXSettingsDlg.h
	StdAfx.cpp
	StdAfx.h
	main.cpp
	resource.h
)


# Support unity build with uber files
set(NoUberFile ${SourceGroup_Root}  )


set (SOURCES
	${NoUberFile}
)
#END-FILE-LIST

# Enable use MFC as Shared Library
set(CMAKE_MFC_FLAG 2)

include_directories( ../../Editor )
include_directories( ../../Editor/Include )

include_directories( ${SDK_DIR}/FbxSdk/include )

add_definitions(-DNOT_USE_CRY_MEMORY_MANAGER)
add_definitions(-DPLUGIN_EXPORTS)
add_definitions(/EHsc)

add_definitions(-DFBXSDK_NEW_API)

add_library( ${THIS_PROJECT} ${SOURCES})

#target_link_libraries(${THIS_PROJECT} Editor)

target_link_libraries(${THIS_PROJECT} debug     ${SDK_DIR}/FbxSdk/lib/vs2012/x64/debug/libfbxsdk-md.lib)
target_link_libraries(${THIS_PROJECT} optimized ${SDK_DIR}/FbxSdk/lib/vs2012/x64/release/libfbxsdk-md.lib)

SET_PLATFORM_TARGET_PROPERTIES( ${THIS_PROJECT} )
